title: [Spoiler] Team Immunity vs Legacy Esports / OPL 2015 Split 2 - W7D2 / Post-Match Discussion
body:
http://oce.lolesports.com/sites/default/files/OPL%20logo.png

[OCE MATCH VODS](http://oce.lolesports.com/vods)


IM | [eSportspedia](http://lol.esportspedia.com/wiki/Team_Immunity) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/TeamImmunity) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/TeamImmunity)
LGC | [eSportspedia](http://lol.esportspedia.com/wiki/Legacy_eSports) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/LegacyEsportsLoL) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/LegacyOCE)

****MATCH 1/1: IM (Blue) vs LGC (Red)**

**Winner:** LGC
**Game Time:** 39:56

**BANS**

**IM**
{{champion:4}} Twisted Fate
{{champion:12}} Alistar
{{champion:111}} Nautilis

**LGC**
{{champion:76}} Nidalee
{{champion:25}} Morgana
{{champion:429}} Kalista


**FINAL SCOREBOARD**

[End Game Screenshot](http://puu.sh/iSFGC/a8d2f5dae8.jpg)

**IM**

| Towers: 5 --------- |Gold : 61.0k ---------- ||Kills:14  |
| :------------------------| |:-----------------:| |:------------:|
| Ryoo                    | Ryze   |  | 6-3-3 |
| Msfish                  | Gragas    | | 2-2-11 |
| Moya                   |Azir       | | 2-8-8 |
| Zenk                 | Tristana         | | 4-4-5   |
| Tgun             | Blitzcrank             || 0-3-8 |


**LGC**

| Towers: 11 --------- |Gold : 73.7k ---------- ||Kills:20  |
| :------------------------| |:-----------------:| |:------------:|
| Minkywhale          | Shen      |  | 1-2-14 |
| Carbon           | Rek'sai     | | 4-5-12 |
| Claire                    | Ezreal          | | 8-3-9 |
| Tallywhacka         | Corki          | | 7-1-8   |
| Flying Joo             | Bard              || 0-3-15 |

replies.body:
The damage is from the amount of AP dmg EZ has equipped. 
This the first time I see the new JG enchantment Runeglaive in league match (and more surprisingly it's on a Mid lane EZ), that's why EZ can do so much dmg (passive from spellblade) but also the 8% missing mana refund + the smite's 15% missing hp & mp to allow him to abuse his skillshot as much as he want.
i think they are also fixing the interaction with ludens echo in the 5.12 patch.

{{champion:13}}  is SOOOO BALANCED (need 3+ player to get rid of him, wtf)

Zenk's Tris has destroyed IM's winning chance (not 100% but 99%+, that jump is totally brainless), Claire's EZ is outstanding, so well played. Duo ADC's poke style has worked very well, plus the Reksai's nice team fight engaging (Msfish's Gragas is doing more of tank than engaging/disengaging, which is abit disappointing, with such a great team gold lead in the early game, he should play more aggresively rather than let Tris to engage/bait)
